languages.text: "Кроме того, здесь собираются все слухи сектора. Если члены экипажа начинают шептаться о вновь обретенном священном мире или желании нести свет Императора в черноту между звезд, я помогаю пастве в исполнении святого долга. Подвижники-первопроходцы нуждаются в содействии как духовном, так и материальном: инструменты, снаряжение, да даже одеяния и простейшие предметы быта — все, что пригодится пилигримам в долгом пути и начале непростой жизни на фронтире, ценится нами на вес злата. Любая помощь из твоих рук в сборе подобного да будет благословлена".

traits.locale_text: "Кроме того, здесь собираются все слухи сектора. Если моряки начинают шептаться о чудесно обнаруженной святой реликвии, я шлю за ней свою паству. Мощи многих подвижников-первопроходцев все еще дрейфуют во мраке в остовах погибших кораблей. Знамена армий, несших свет Императора в этот темный край, утрачены и не почитаются как должно. Я исправляю это по мере сил".
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "Furthermore, rumours from across the entire sector amass on Footfall. If I hear crewmen whispering about a reclaimed shrine world or expressing desire to carry the Emperor's light into the darkness among the stars, I help my flock in their sacred duty. Devoted trailblazers need assistance both spiritual and material: tools, equipment, even garments and simple everyday items — anything that might help pilgrims on their long journey and during the first days of the harsh frontier life is worth its weight in gold to us. May any help you offer to the effort of gathering such things be blessed."
languages.original_text: "Кроме того, здесь собираются все слухи сектора. Если члены экипажа начинают шептаться о вновь обретенном священном мире или желании нести свет Императора в черноту между звезд, я помогаю пастве в исполнении святого долга. Devoted trailblazers need assistance both spiritual and material: tools, equipment, even garments and simple everyday items — anything that might help pilgrims on their long journey and during the first days of the harsh frontier life is worth its weight in gold to us. May any help you offer to the effort of gathering such things be blessed."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

traits.locale_text: "Furthermore, rumours from across the entire sector amass in Footfall. If I hear crewmen whispering about a miraculous discovery of a holy relic, I send my flock after it. The remains of many devoted trailblazers still drift through the darkness in dead ships. The banners of the armies that brought the Emperor's light to this dismal place were lost and are not being honoured as they should be. I work to rectify this as best I can."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

traits.locale_text: "Furthermore, rumours from across the entire sector amass in Footfall. languages.text: “不仅如此，落脚港这里会有来自整个星域的传言。如果我听到船员们低声谈论某个被夺回的神殿世界，或者听到有人说希望将帝皇的光辉带入群星的黑暗之中，我便会引导我的牧群，履行他们的神圣职责。虔诚的开拓者需要精神与物质方面的援助，包括工具、设备、以及衣物与简单的日常用品。无论是什么，只要能帮助朝圣者熬过漫长的旅途，熬过最初那段严酷的开荒期，对我们而言都非常有用。在收集物资的过程中，愿你们的一切帮助都能得到祝福。”
languages.original_text: "Furthermore, rumours from across the entire sector amass on Footfall. If I hear crewmen whispering about a reclaimed shrine world or expressing desire to carry the Emperor's light into the darkness among the stars, I help my flock in their sacred duty. Devoted trailblazers need assistance both spiritual and material: tools, equipment, even garments and simple everyday items — anything that might help pilgrims on their long journey and during the first days of the harsh frontier life is worth its weight in gold to us. May any help you offer to the effort of gathering such things be blessed."

traits.locale_text: “不仅如此，落脚港这里会有来自整个星域的传言。如果我听到船员们低声谈论某个被夺回的神殿世界，或者听到有人说希望将帝皇的光辉带入群星的黑暗之中，我便会引导我的牧群，履行他们的神圣职责。虔诚的开拓者需要精神与物质方面的援助，包括工具、设备、以及衣物与简单的日常用品。无论是什么，只要能帮助朝圣者熬过漫长的旅途，熬过最初那段严酷的开荒期，对我们而言都非常有用。在收集物资的过程中，愿你们的一切帮助都能得到祝福。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: «Y lo que es más: en Paso se acumulan rumores de todo el sector. Si llega a mis oídos que los tripulantes están cuchicheando sobre un templo recuperado o que su deseo es llevar la luz del Emperador a la oscuridad entre las estrellas, puedo ayudar a mi rebaño en su deber sagrado. Los pioneros leales necesitan ayuda espiritual y material en forma de herramientas, equipamiento, prendas de ropa y enseres del día a día. Cualquier cosa que pueda ayudar a los peregrinos en su largo viaje y durante los primeros días de la extenuante vida fronteriza vale su peso en oro. Bendita sea toda ayuda que nos pueda proporcionar».
languages.original_text: "Furthermore, rumours from across the entire sector amass on Footfall. If I hear crewmen whispering about a reclaimed shrine world or expressing desire to carry the Emperor's light into the darkness among the stars, I help my flock in their sacred duty. Devoted trailblazers need assistance both spiritual and material: tools, equipment, even garments and simple everyday items — anything that might help pilgrims on their long journey and during the first days of the harsh frontier life is worth its weight in gold to us. May any help you offer to the effort of gathering such things be blessed."

traits.locale_text: «Y lo que es más: en Paso se acumulan rumores de todo el sector. Si llega a mis oídos que los tripulantes están cuchicheando sobre un templo recuperado o que su deseo es llevar la luz del Emperador a la oscuridad entre las estrellas, puedo ayudar a mi rebaño en su deber sagrado. Los pioneros leales necesitan ayuda espiritual y material en forma de herramientas, equipamiento, prendas de ropa y enseres del día a día. Cualquier cosa que pueda ayudar a los peregrinos en su largo viaje y durante los primeros días de la extenuante vida fronteriza vale su peso en oro. Bendita sea toda ayuda que nos pueda proporcionar».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: 「さらに、星域中の噂がフットフォールに集まってきます。乗組員たちが礼拝惑星の再生や、皇帝陛下の御光を星々の闇の中に運びたいという願望をささやいていれば、私は悩める子羊が神聖な義務を果たせるように手助けします。道具や装備、衣服や簡単な日用品に至るまで、巡礼者たちの長い旅路や過酷な開拓生活の始まりに役立ちそうなものは何でも、我々にとっては非常に価値があります。こういった物資を集めるために援助してくだされば、大変ありがたく存じます」
languages.original_text: "Furthermore, rumours from across the entire sector amass on Footfall. If I hear crewmen whispering about a reclaimed shrine world or expressing desire to carry the Emperor's light into the darkness among the stars, I help my flock in their sacred duty. Devoted trailblazers need assistance both spiritual and material: tools, equipment, even garments and simple everyday items — anything that might help pilgrims on their long journey and during the first days of the harsh frontier life is worth its weight in gold to us. May any help you offer to the effort of gathering such things be blessed."

traits.locale_text: 「さらに、星域中の噂がフットフォールに集まってきます。乗組員たちが礼拝惑星の再生や、皇帝陛下の御光を星々の闇の中に運びたいという願望をささやいていれば、私は悩める子羊が神聖な義務を果たせるように手助けします。道具や装備、衣服や簡単な日用品に至るまで、巡礼者たちの長い旅路や過酷な開拓生活の始まりに役立ちそうなものは何でも、我々にとっては非常に価値があります。こういった物資を集めるために援助してくだされば、大変ありがたく存じます」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "Darüber hinaus gelangen die Gerüchte aus dem gesamten Sektor nach Footfall. Wenn ich Crewmitglieder von einer zurückeroberten Schreinwelt flüstern oder den Wunsch äußern höre, das Licht des Imperators zu den Sternen zu tragen, dann helfe ich meiner Herde bei ihrer heiligen Pflicht. Hingebungsvolle Wegbereiter benötigen spirituelle und materielle Unterstützung: Werkzeug, Ausrüstung, sogar Kleidung und einfache Alltagsgegenstände – alles, was Pilgern auf ihrer langen Reise und in der Anfangszeit des entbehrungsreichen Lebens im Grenzgebiet dienlich sein könnte, ist für uns Gold wert. Jede Bemühung Eurerseits, derlei zu beschaffen, sei gesegnet."
languages.original_text: "Furthermore, rumours from across the entire sector amass on Footfall. If I hear crewmen whispering about a reclaimed shrine world or expressing desire to carry the Emperor's light into the darkness among the stars, I help my flock in their sacred duty. Devoted trailblazers need assistance both spiritual and material: tools, equipment, even garments and simple everyday items — anything that might help pilgrims on their long journey and during the first days of the harsh frontier life is worth its weight in gold to us. May any help you offer to the effort of gathering such things be blessed."

traits.locale_text: "Darüber hinaus gelangen die Gerüchte aus dem gesamten Sektor nach Footfall. Wenn ich Crewmitglieder von einer zurückeroberten Schreinwelt flüstern oder den Wunsch äußern höre, das Licht des Imperators zu den Sternen zu tragen, dann helfe ich meiner Herde bei ihrer heiligen Pflicht. Hingebungsvolle Wegbereiter benötigen spirituelle und materielle Unterstützung: Werkzeug, Ausrüstung, sogar Kleidung und einfache Alltagsgegenstände – alles, was Pilgern auf ihrer langen Reise und in der Anfangszeit des entbehrungsreichen Lebens im Grenzgebiet dienlich sein könnte, ist für uns Gold wert. Jede Bemühung Eurerseits, derlei zu beschaffen, sei gesegnet."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: « Qui plus est, toutes les rumeurs du secteur finissent à Castel. Quand j'entends des membres d'équipage parler tout bas d'un monde sanctuaire ayant été repris, ou exprimer le souhait de propager la lumière de l'Empereur dans les ténèbres au milieu des étoiles, j'aide mes ouailles à accomplir leur devoir sacré. Un pionnier fervent aura toujours besoin d'aide, aussi bien spirituelle que matérielle : des outils, du matériel, ou même des vêtements et de simples objets du quotidien. Tout ce qui pourrait aider un pèlerin au cours de son voyage et dans les premiers jours de sa vie difficile dans les confins vaut son poids en or à nos yeux. Puissiez-vous être {mf|béni|bénie} si vous nous aidez à rassembler ce genre de choses. »
languages.original_text: "Furthermore, rumours from across the entire sector amass on Footfall. If I hear crewmen whispering about a reclaimed shrine world or expressing desire to carry the Emperor's light into the darkness among the stars, I help my flock in their sacred duty. Devoted trailblazers need assistance both spiritual and material: tools, equipment, even garments and simple everyday items — anything that might help pilgrims on their long journey and during the first days of the harsh frontier life is worth its weight in gold to us. May any help you offer to the effort of gathering such things be blessed."

traits.locale_text: « Qui plus est, toutes les rumeurs du secteur finissent à Castel. Quand j'entends des membres d'équipage parler tout bas d'un monde sanctuaire ayant été repris, ou exprimer le souhait de propager la lumière de l'Empereur dans les ténèbres au milieu des étoiles, j'aide mes ouailles à accomplir leur devoir sacré. Un pionnier fervent aura toujours besoin d'aide, aussi bien spirituelle que matérielle : des outils, du matériel, ou même des vêtements et de simples objets du quotidien. Tout ce qui pourrait aider un pèlerin au cours de son voyage et dans les premiers jours de sa vie difficile dans les confins vaut son poids en or à nos yeux. Puissiez-vous être {mf|béni|bénie} si vous nous aidez à rassembler ce genre de choses. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "Dahası, tüm sektördeki söylentilerin hepsi Binliman'da toplanır. Tayfaların ele geçirilmiş bir mabet dünyadan veya İmparator'un ışığını yıldızların arasındaki karanlığa taşıma isteklerinden söz ettiklerini duyduğumda, kutsal vazifelerinde cemaatime yardımcı olurum. Kendilerini davaya adamış öncüler hem ruhani hem maddi desteğe ihtiyaç duyarlar. Bunlar da gereç, ekipman, hatta kıyafet ve sıradan gündelik ihtiyaçlardır. Önlerindeki uzun yolculukta ve sınırdaki zorlu yaşamlarının ilk günlerinde seyyahlara yardımcı olabilecek bir şeyler temin etmek, bizim için ağırlığınca altın değerindedir. Böyle şeyleri toplamak için göstereceğin her türlü çaba kutsaldır."
languages.original_text: "Furthermore, rumours from across the entire sector amass on Footfall. If I hear crewmen whispering about a reclaimed shrine world or expressing desire to carry the Emperor's light into the darkness among the stars, I help my flock in their sacred duty. Devoted trailblazers need assistance both spiritual and material: tools, equipment, even garments and simple everyday items — anything that might help pilgrims on their long journey and during the first days of the harsh frontier life is worth its weight in gold to us. May any help you offer to the effort of gathering such things be blessed."

traits.locale_text: "Dahası, tüm sektördeki söylentilerin hepsi Binliman'da toplanır. Eğer mürettebatların geri alınmış bir mabet dünyasından veya İmparator'un ışığını yıldızların arasındaki karanlığa taşıma isteklerinden söz ettiklerini duyarsam, cemaatime bu kutsal görevlerinde yardımcı olurum. Kendilerini adamış öncüler hem ruhani hem de somut desteğe ihtiyaç duyarlar: Gereçler, ekipmanlar, hatta kıyafetler ve sıradan günlük ihtiyaçlar. Seyyahlara önlerindeki uzun yolculukta ve zorlu cephelerdeki yaşamlarındaki ilk günlerinde yardımcı olabilecek bir şeyler temin edebilmek bizim için ağırlığınca altın değerindedir. Bu tip şeyleri toplamak için gösterilebilecek her türlü yardıma müteşekkir oluruz."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian
